languages.text: {n}Фесмофориус, принявший в свое нутро щедрые подношения, гудит и чадит дымом. Словно взбудораженные жестоким зрелищем, толпа вокруг вас начинает гудеть в такт машине для казни. В шуме вам слышется голодное предвкушение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Азарт в глазах палача резко потухает.{/n}"Как пожелаете, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ваше слово — закон для меня".

languages.text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фесмофориус, принявший в свое нутро щедрые подношения, гудит и чадит дымом. Словно взбудораженные жестоким зрелищем, толпа вокруг вас начинает гудеть в такт машине для казни. В шуме вам слышется голодное предвкушение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Having taken the generous offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows with smoke. As if aroused by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you starts humming to the beat of the execution device. You can hear the deep thrumming of hungry anticipation.{/n}

{n}Having taken the generous offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows with smoke. As if aroused by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you starts humming to the beat of the execution device. You can hear the deep thrumming of hungry anticipation.{/n}

{n}Having taken your generous offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. As if aroused by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

{n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

{n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}菲斯摩弗瑞斯将丰盛的祭品吞入腹中，发出了咆哮声，吐出了滚滚浓烟。周围的人群也被这残忍的场面煽动，随着行刑机器的节拍哼唱起来。在所有人的嘈杂声中，你听到了饥渴难耐的期待。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}菲斯摩弗瑞斯将丰盛的祭品吞入腹中，发出了咆哮声，吐出了滚滚浓烟。周围的人群也被这残忍的场面煽动，随着行刑机器的节拍哼唱起来。在所有人的嘈杂声中，你听到了饥渴难耐的期待。{/n}
{n}菲斯摩弗瑞斯将丰厚的祭品吞入腹中，发出了咆哮声，吐出了滚滚浓烟。你周围的人群也仿佛被这残忍的场面唤醒，随着行刑机器的节拍哼唱起来。在所有人的嘈杂声中，你听到了饥渴难耐的期待。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Habiendo engullido tus abundantes ofrendas, el fesmoforio ruge y escupe bocanadas de humo. Enardecida por el cruel espectáculo, la muchedumbre se pone a canturrear al ritmo del instrumento de ejecución. Y en su clamor, oyes el sonido de su ávida expectación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Habiendo engullido tus abundantes ofrendas, el fesmoforio ruge y escupe bocanadas de humo. Enardecida por el cruel espectáculo, la muchedumbre se pone a canturrear al ritmo del instrumento de ejecución. Y en su clamor, oyes el sonido de su ávida expectación.{/n}

{n}Habiendo engullido tus abundantes ofrendas, el fesmoforio ruge y escupe bocanadas de humo. Enardecida por el cruel espectáculo, la muchedumbre se pone a canturrear al ritmo del instrumento de ejecución. Y en su clamor, oyes el sonido de su ávida expectación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bol sayıdaki adağı midesine indiren Pesmoforyus, kükreyip duman çıkarıyor. Sanki zalim temaşadan uyarılmış gibi etrafındaki kalabalık, infaz cihazının ritmine göre mırıldanmaya başlıyor. O gürültünün içinde aç bir beklentinin sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bol sayıdaki adağı midesine indiren Pesmoforyus, kükreyip duman çıkarıyor. Sanki zalim temaşadan uyarılmış gibi etrafındaki kalabalık, infaz cihazının ritmine göre mırıldanmaya başlıyor. O gürültünün içinde aç bir beklentinin sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}

{n}Bol sayıdaki adağı midesine indiren Pesmoforyus, kükreyip duman çıkarıyor. Sanki zalim temaşadan uyarılmış gibi etrafındaki kalabalık, infaz cihazının ritmine göre mırıldanmaya başlıyor. O gürültünün içinde aç bir beklentinin sesini duyuyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有り余るほどの捧げ物を受けて、フェスモフォリウスは轟音を立てて、もうもうと煙を吹き出す。あなたの周りの群衆が処刑装置の音に合わせて鼻歌を歌い始める。その騒音の中に、飢えた期待の音を聞く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有り余るほどの捧げ物を受けて、フェスモフォリウスは轟音を立てて、もうもうと煙を吹き出す。残酷な光景に興奮したかのように、あなたの周りの群衆が処刑装置の音に合わせて鼻歌を歌い始める。その騒音の中に、飢えた期待の音を聞く。{/n}
{n}有り余るほどの捧げ物を受けて、フェスモフォリウスは轟音を立てて、もうもうと煙を吹き出す。残酷な光景に興奮したかのように、あなたの周りの群衆が処刑装置の音に合わせて鼻歌を歌い始める。その騒音の中に、飢えた期待の音を聞く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La panse remplie de vos généreuses offrandes, le Phesmophorius rugit et crache force nuages de fumée. Ravie par ce spectacle ô combien cruel, la foule autour de vous se met à fredonner au diapason de l'engin de justice et dans cette sinistre litanie, vous percevez les accents d'une impatience fiévreuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La panse remplie de vos généreuses offrandes, le Phesmophorius rugit et crache force nuages de fumée. Ravie par ce spectacle ô combien cruel, la foule autour de vous se met à fredonner au diapason de l'engin de justice et dans cette sinistre litanie, vous percevez les accents d'une impatience fiévreuse.{/n}

{n}La panse remplie de vos généreuses offrandes, le Phesmophorius rugit et crache force nuages de fumée. Ravie par ce spectacle ô combien cruel, la foule autour de vous se met à fredonner au diapason de l'engin de justice et dans cette sinistre litanie, vous percevez les accents d'une impatience fiévreuse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem der Phesmophorius deine reichen Opfergaben aufgenommen hat, brüllt er auf und speit Rauch. Von dem grausamen Spektakel erregt, beginnt die Menge um dich herum, im Takt des Henkersgeräts zu summen. In diesem Summen hörst du auch den Klang hungriger Vorfreude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having taken your plentiful offerings into its gut, the Phesmophorius roars and billows out smoke. Spurred by the cruel spectacle, the crowd around you begins humming to the beat of the execution device. Within that noise, you hear the sound of hungry anticipation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem der Phesmophorius deine reichen Opfergaben aufgenommen hat, brüllt er auf und speit Rauch. Von dem grausamen Spektakel erregt, beginnt die Menge um dich herum, im Takt des Henkersgeräts zu summen. In diesem Summen hörst du auch den Klang hungriger Vorfreude.{/n}

{n}Nachdem der Phesmophorius deine reichen Opfergaben aufgenommen hat, brüllt er auf und speit Rauch. Als würde das grausame Spektakel sie erregen, beginnt die Menge um dich herum, im Takt des Henkersgeräts zu summen. In diesem Summen hörst du auch den Klang hungriger Vorfreude.{/n}
